name: @applicaster/react-native-boilerplate
description: React-Native Component displaying data protection screen

scripts.build: npm run build:ios && bpm run build:android
scripts.build:ios: react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.ios.js --bundle-output tmp/build/ios/index.ios.bundle.js
scripts.build:android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output tmp/build/android/index.android.bundle.js
scripts.build:staging: npm run build:ios && npm run build:android
scripts.build:staging:ios: react-native bundle --platform ios --dev true --entry-file index.ios.js --bundle-output tmp/build/ios/index.ios.bundle.js
scripts.build:staging:android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev true --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output tmp/build/android/index.android.bundle.js
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:ios && npm run deploy:android
scripts.deploy:ios: npm run build:ios && aws s3 sync tmp/build/ios s3://assets-production.applicaster.com/zapp/react-native-bundles/react-native-boilerplate/0_50_4/0.1.0/ios --region us-east-1 --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers
scripts.deploy:android: npm run build:android && aws s3 sync tmp/build/android s3://assets-production.applicaster.com/zapp/react-native-bundles/react-native-boilerplate/0_50_4/0.1.0/android --region us-east-1 --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run deploy:staging:ios && npm run deploy:staging:android
scripts.deploy:staging:ios: npm run build:staging:ios && aws s3 sync tmp/build/ios s3://assets-staging.applicaster.com/zapp/react-native-bundles/staging/react-native-boilerplate/0_50_4/0.1.0/ios --region us-east-1 --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers
scripts.deploy:staging:android: npm run build:staging:android && aws s3 sync tmp/build/android s3://assets-staging.applicaster.com/zapp/react-native-bundles/react-native-boilerplate/0_50_4/0.1.0/android --region us-east-1 --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers

author: Applicaster

hooks.pre-push: npm test && npm run lint && npm run format
